entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [android] trimmer warning for `System.Private.CoreLib.dll` #100256
  • NullabilityInfoContext is not thread-safe #100254
  • [browser][MT] Process terminated assert handling #100249
    9.0.0
  • Test `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` stack overflowing in Windows x64 release for `libraries-pgo` pipeline #100246
  • JIT: `_Sse41_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Sse41.Program.RoundToNearestIntegerSingle()` failed in `jitpartialcompilation_pgo` for linux x64 #100245
  • [API Proposal]: Default SearchValues character classes #100244
  • iOS: Breakpoint not hit in classes containing static fields that are initialized inline #100243
  • yieldprocessornormalized appears to be incorrect in some scenarios #100242
  • [apple][HybridGlobalization] Enable more System.Globalization.Tests for Apple Hybrid-Globalization #100240
    9.0.0
  • Synchronous call inside XDocument.LoadAsync #100239
  • mono_jit_compile_method_jit_only failed #100237
    9.0.0
  • Disabling Blazor SIMD support breaks published app during runtime when AOT=false during publish #100234
    9.0.0
  • How to config the AOT compilation process #100232
    9.0.0
  • NegotiateStream fails when authenticating from linux client to windows server #100231
  • FileStream Flush(true) significant performance degradation in .NET 8 when buffer size is bigger than the payload #100229
  • [NAOT][Apple] NativeAOT TrimmingBehaviors smoke tests failing on apple mobile #100226
  • [mono] System.IO.Tests.MemoryStreamTests.MemoryStream_SeekOverflow_Throws OOM on windows-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono #100225
  • [mono][android] Failures in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildChainForSelfSignedCertificate_* #100224
  • Non-blittable struct with explicit layout has wrong managed size #100220
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.QuicException : The connection timed out from inactivity. #100219
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #100217
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.CanBeFinalized #100216
  • riscv64 builds fail with "No usable version of clang found." error #100215

Closed

  • Blazor debug proxy and Mono proxy should generate ETL events #38285
  • Trying to statically link libc with NativeAOT causes a fatal crash in the linker #100230
  • Does this work with .NET 8? #98235
  • DEREF_OF_NULL.EX at runtime/src/coreclr/vm/zapsig.cpp #100209
  • Stateless Managed->Unmanaged marshaller does not call GetPinnableReference #96932
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToHGlobalUTF8 is declared as private, but the rest of UTF-8 functions in Marshal are public #99886
  • System.Text.Json 7.0.2 fails to load in a .net6 application. #93780
  • Assertion failed 'lastBlockILEndOffset < beginOffs' #100125
    9.0.0
  • Error exporting https certificate on macOS Sonoma 14.4 #99735
    9.0.0
  • Half.ToString fails for highest precision #98841
  • Unable to run dotnet runtime on linux-musl-x86 #100223
  • CONTRACT_VIOLATION during runtime startup on main #100236
  • [NativeAOT] System.Runtime.Tests occasionally crashes on linux-arm-NativeAOT #99079
  • DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX in src/coreclr/vm/readytoruninfo.cpp #100208
  • .NET 8 Preview 7 Blazor WebAssembly PWA, not working on iPhone & iPad #90710
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm][Interp] mono_raise_exception implementation problems #99366
  • How to Obtain a Method Pointer Without Reflection in NativeAOT? #100103
  • [NATIVEAOT] lld duplicate symbol compilation error when building for linux-bionic-arm #100191

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add peephole for reversing condition and removing false jump #100262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Build Subset Help Not Displaying #100261
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Process.OSX: fix thread safety #100260
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Support building against clang 18 #100258
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #100257
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • The layout of the `ITypeLib2` interface is incorrect. #100255
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • remove test references to obsolete OSes #100247
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Reenable C4242 and C4244 warnings in libunwind #100241
    Security, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] reduce use of wrap_error_root #100233
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delay MsQuicSendBuffers disposal to QuicStream safe handle closing. #100228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WIP][Mono][infra] Disable failing tests/pipelines on runtime-extra-platforms #100227
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Simplify floating point mod and round jit helpers implementations #100222
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100221
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Switch from array to collection expression in OidLookup #100252
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid IDE030X suggestions for collection expressions that could change semantics/perf #100250
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove remaining SVE references from emitarm64.cpp #100100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Delete ENCODE_FIELD_SIG_IndexInsteadOfToken #100214
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Set `bbCodeOffsEnd` to BAD_IL_OFFSET when expanding static init calls #100152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Populate JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider in the source generator. #100173
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix HalfNumberBufferLength #100187
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a uniform representation for parameter ABI information #100138
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete RequiresProcessIsolation on some tests #100172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] disable jiterp + enable safe points #100156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove ldr/str stack var tests (#100101) #100153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add templated register encoding methods #100081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Avoid 0-length array allocation for empty Distinct/Union.ToArray #100218
    area-System.Linq
  • Update CodeAnalysis config to include recently-added rules #100146
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Remove unused assembly files #100201
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58 #100084
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix RhGetCurrentThunkContext/RhCommonStub on linux-bionic-arm #100192
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update VS install requirements to bump Windows 10 SDK version #100170
    area-Meta, 9.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Prevent hoisting nodes with order side effects #100160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    NO-REVIEW, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `GT_MKREFANY` #100204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOREVIEW] Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100168
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99586
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100199
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] handle exceptions #100148
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] [net7] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #100063
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 7.0.x
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #99664
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing #100004
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move `GenerateJSModuleManifest` from pack to sdk #99675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-riscv
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Convert most of variant to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Deduplicate header Separator logic #100179
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build win-x86 NativeAOT runtime pack #100195
    NO-MERGE, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use number of slots intead of size in BuildBlockStore #100206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sometimes build and sometimes error #39753
  • IDE0130 is not reported correctly in 8.0.2xx #39742
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'alpine.3.19-x64' is not recognized. #39733

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]Download .net9preview3 x86sdk on ARM64OS access is denied for dotnet. #39649
  • Publish AOT increases the assembly file size! #39012

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish Roslyn Framework Toolset package as part of SDK #39743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39647
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove checked-in registry value #39731
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • use noble Ubuntu images by default starting in 8.0.300, #39614
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2413322 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    12.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012
  • Add proposal for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extend GetDataTipText to support hover on expressions #72729
  • Compiler cannot parse nullable types in pattern matching #72720
  • EnC: convert EditAndContinueLanguageService to service broker service #72713
  • IDE0078 should be configurable to only apply to type checks #72711
  • csharp_new_line_before_open_brace Styling Rule backwards #72710
  • Unsupported .editorconfig properties are silently ignored #72709
  • Unnecessary creation of ITextBuffer just to get a checksum #72703

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: SourceTextTokenParser #72518
    17.10
  • NRE in ConversionsBase.ClassifyImplicitConversionFromType #72541
    17.10
  • Rename toggle button not shown up in light theme #72681
  • No error reported for overload ambiguity with extension methods with identical signatures and `params` arrays #72696
  • A ton of C# keywords are missing in `langword` doc comment tag completions #72258
    Backlog
  • c# struct operator taking "in" (byref) fails to report CS8374 when used with "this" and can expose internals / cause stack corruption #72239
    17.10
  • ref safety broken with cast operators #71773
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Update config for 17.10 P3 snap #72728
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Snap 17.10 P3 #72727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Modify BinderFactory to use a shared pool instead of one per BinderFactory instance. #72725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Store and display the times when files were generated. #72724
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version" #72723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove serialization of SourceTexts #72722
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some crash dump tips for Linux #72719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove additional parts of legacy diagnostics system. #72718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compiler server fixes #72716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IEmbeddedLanguageClassificationService is optional in the workspaces layer #72712
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Serialize the content hash for a source text so it does not need to be recomputed #72705
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Speed up go-to-def by utilizing frozen snapshots #72714
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Simplify service export #72707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Do not call `IsBetterCollectionExpressionConversion` for identical collection types. #72706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.10 P3
  • Follow up on addition of `InternalSpecialType` #72704
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Remove unused portions of the legacy diagnostic service. #72702
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Provide all possible keywords in xml doc comment `langword` tag #72694
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • generate package for clasp binary to ensure symbols exist #72686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Add Emit3 to `-testCompilerOnly` build flag #72685
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Bind to the background of border #72682
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, 17.10 P3
  • Remove invisible character in official pipeline yaml #72665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Using Segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #72656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Hande error scenarios involving target types and named arguments in nullable walker #72635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3

Updated

  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest.EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry` #54757
  • AuthenticationService.ts used in Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal missing popup-Api #54756
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.ThreadingAppTest.IsStarted`, and `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.ThreadingAppTest.HasHeading` #54754
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #54749
  • Fix breaking change when using lazy loading with webcil #54746
  • Byte rate metrics #54745
  • Virtualize and displaying content at the end of the list #54742
  • Virtualize component doesn't work with hidden elements #54741
  • Avoid resetting AccessFailedCount by CheckPasswordSignIn in ASP.Net Identity #54733
  • In Blazor Web App InteractiveWebAssembly, using select with onchange event does not work when clicking from dropdown, but work with up/down key from keyboard. #54732
  • Unhandled exception: When using popup components on an InteractiveServer page and navigating to any other InteractiveServer page #54731

Closed

  • [SupplyParameterFromQuery] property not being set during OnInitializedAsync #53055
    8.0.3
  • [extensions] dependency out of date #54753
  • ASP.NET Core 8 Web API causing blocking behavior #54730
  • MissingMethodException IsComponentDisposed() after update to .NET 7.0.17 #54614
  • First page load or any subsequent refreshes always utilize Blazor Server, while booting WebAssembly in the background #54570
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #54718
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #54717
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #54719
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #54720
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #54721
  • Perf improvement: https #54729
  • "Onclick" JavaScript invocations no longer working after upgrade to .NET 8.0 from .NET 7.0 #54560

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine 'ThreadingAppTest.HasHeading' and 'ThreadingAppTest.IsStarted' #54755
    area-blazor
  • Fix dockerfile references for helix #54752
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24175.4 #54734
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add retry for `WebViewManagerE2ETests.CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton` #54751
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Auto-generated baselines by 1ES Pipeline Templates #54747
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix buildArgs, publishArgs in public #54750
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Remove internal args from public build #54748
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Set correct ProductVersion for productVersion.txt #54710
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Quarantine tests in `ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest` #54758
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during trimming if used in JS interop #54655
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.5
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Error: No CLR runtime found (dump collected with 8.0.0) #4563
    8.0.0
  • Timeout while executing StartEventPipeSession #4557

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21439
  • Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception #21437
  • Compile-time binding of BindingContext should use the inherited x:DataType #21434
  • Invoking the PropertyChanged event throws NullReferenceException #21431
  • Image with AspectFill resizes the container it is in #21420
  • Page content not showing when navigation happens in background #21419
  • Mac Catalyst bindable properties not updating after being set #21417

Closed

  • iOS `Entry` Control Ignores `TextColor` Property Upon Binding Update #21430

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance decrease (10x?) in database migration 8.0.0 vs 8.0.3 #33399
  • Can't update row when UseHistoryTable is enabled. #33397
  • Using static methods in compiled query issue #33395
  • Update a null value on JSON column not working #33392

Closed

  • Mixing inheritance strategies #33394
  • Throw for sync APIs when using Cosmos since they do sync over async #32563
    9.0.0
  • Is EF Core dead like EF6 (classic) or why is there no plan for EF9 four months after the release of EF8? #33364
  • LINQ Client-Side Evaluation with a Cast in the Select Clause #33377
  • Compiled query does not respect ChangeTracker.QueryTrackingBehavior #33389

PullRequests

Created

  • Configure the guardian baseline path #33398
  • Return flattened properties of complex types in correct order #33393

Merged

  • Make Cosmos provider throw for sync I/O #33386

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    tell-mode
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
  • [release/8.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33305
    tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33304
    blocked, tell-mode
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Fix key generation validation for TPC. #33371
  • API review changes #33388
